main event: Observation of a bright stationary light identified as an unidentified flying object (UFO) hovering in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 15-20 ft. in diameter., The object remained stationary for a short period before disappearing rapidly., The sighting lasted for about 4-5 minutes., The witness claimed the object was the size of a ping pong ball with small wings., Multiple witnesses, including the observer's son and dock workers, corroborated the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. W, a 55-year-old housewife, and two dock workers
